contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 27, 1892 D Blyth Contest
Blyth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
blyth-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Cinq Mars [arr. Godfrey]
Blyth, Northumberland Best cornet, trombone and euphonium to Kingston Mills. Quickstep: 1. Kingston Mills, 2. South Derwent, 3. Tanfield. Prizes - 1st £30, 2nd £20, 3rd £12, 4th £6, 5th £4, 6th £3. 6 bands competed.
April 8, 2012, 10:54 a.m. June 3, 2019, 8:48 p.m.
1 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr
2 South Derwent William Rimmer
3 Hartlepool Borough Prize J. Cornforth
4 Tanfield Lea Alexander Owen
5 Hebburn Artillery Thomas Henderson
6 Blyth Artillery Volunteers (Cowpen) J. R. Mason
